entries.description: Loosen inline completion support limitations for YAML/JSON
Fix error occuring when Amazon Q attempts to show UI hints on manually triggerred inline suggestion (#4929)
Amazon Q (/dev): provide error messaging when no code changes are required for the prompt
Fix 'Slow operations are prohibited on EDT.' when Amazon Q is determining if a file supports inline suggestions (#4823)
Amazon Q Feature Dev: Add error messages when the upload URL expires
Fix toolkit connection dropdown getting hidden when panel width is small.
Fix inability to sign out in reauth view in Q chat panel
Automatically pause and resume `@workspace` indexing when OS CPU load is high
